sequence.comment: Step 2: Use SYSTEM_COMMAND to check what was stored

parameters.command: echo Variable firefoxWindows should contain window data

sequence.comment: Step 3: Try to extract just the variable content using UIA_GET_CLIPBOARD
Step 4: Get the clipboard to see if substitution worked
Step 6: Get clipboard again to see array indexing result
Step 7: Try with both parameter names

parameters.command: echo Testing window parameter with value: ${firefoxWindows[0]}
